Visualization Documentation

This page provides documentation on the several parts of the visualization, what they show, and how they can be interacted with. The first part of the documentation explains common terminology and principles from information visualization and interaction design that are used in the visualization, and that are helpful for understanding the descriptions. Then, the individual views and their functionalities are explained. These individual texts can also be accessed from within the visualization by clicking on the question mark icon in the upper right of each view.
